title: Week 13 Dilemmas + Buy or Sell, Fantasy Q&A - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/1
description:
December is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode heading into Week 13! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of tough start / sit decisions! Plus, rest of season outlooks, injury updates, and a preview of the Thursday Night matchup of the Cowboys and Saints. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 1st, 2021.
  
 (06:45) - Buy or Sell
 (13:35) - News & Notes
 (23:00) - Mailbag
 (24:45) - Aaron Jones or AJ Dillon?
 (27:00) - David Johnson or Alex Collins?
 (30:00) - Lockett or Renfrow rest of season?
 (32:40) - Zach Ertz or Logan Thomas rest of season?
 (34:40) - Will Saquon Barkley ever be elite again?
 (36:05) - How do I cope with sucking at fantasy football?
 (38:45) - Jaylen Waddle or Amari Cooper rest of season?
 (41:55) - Can I have #dinnerbutter for breakfast?
 (42:45) - What is the origin story of Jay Griz?
 (44:50) - Thursday Night Breakdown - Cowboys at Saints
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
